product_details_and_care:
Clean, modern and completely unfussy, this roomy leather tote is topped with comfortable top-carry handles and a convenient optional crossbody strap for when you want to wear the style hands-free. The USA vegetable-tanned leather develops a beautiful patina over time, while the top-zip closure ensures all your everyday necessities stay in place.
Top zip closure
Top carry handles; removable, adjustable crossbody strap
Interior wall pocket
Flat base for stability
Leather
Imported
Handbags
